entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, whose mind is teeming with memories not his own.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is shaken by Harry's sudden memory recall.

entities.name: hook-nosed man
entities.description: A character in one of the memories that Harry recalls.

entities.description: A character in one of the memories that Harry recalls.

entities.name: small dark-haired boy
entities.description: A character in one of the memories that Harry recalls.

relationships.description: Harry's sudden memory recall causes Snape to be shaken.
Harry recalls a memory of a hook-nosed man shouting at a cowering woman.
